commit.message:
[wallet] ListCoins: include watch-only for wallets without private keys

This makes them available in GUI coin selection.

[wallet] ListCoins: include watch-only for wallets without private keys

This makes them available in GUI coin selection.

commit.message:
[gui] send: include watch-only

For wallets with WALLET_FLAG_DISABLE_PRIVATE_KEYS.
